thread.title: First Draft: Bernie Sanders: ‘Stand Up to Corporate America’
thread.title_full: First Draft: Bernie Sanders: ‘Stand Up to Corporate America’

author: FIRST DRAFT
title: First Draft: Bernie Sanders: ‘Stand Up to Corporate America’
text:
Video Sanders at Democratic Women’s Forum Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont spoke at the Democratic Party’s Women’s Leadership Forum, urging the audience to stand up to corporate America and “the billionaire class.” By REUTERS on Publish Date October 23, 2015. Photo by Mark Wilson/Getty Images. Thu. Oct. 22 15 Posts About First Draft 
First Draft provides fast-paced and comprehensive coverage of politics and elections by The New York Times. Come back throughout the day for the latest news and analysis, and be part of the political conversation. 
Like it? Hate it? Have a tip for us? Send any and all feedback to firstdraft@nytimes.com . Politics Newsletter 
We send out a newsletter around 7 a.m. eastern time each weekday that serves as a look-ahead to the day's political events and expected stories.
